section.name: Introduction
section.p: Welcome to a Java implementation of the Mork format. For more details on the Mork database format, please see the section What is Mork?

subsection.name: Supported Features
subsection.p: This is a list of features already supported by this Mork implementation. It is not complete, but covers all the basic stuff required to read 80% of the available files.

ul.li:
Read Mork files, including:
Dictionaries
Literals
Rows
Tables
Cells
Groups
Object References
